message.body: Heya. So..do you want to commit to papos brunch on July 13?
Unfortunatly i just checked my calendar and i have two other gigs that week. I wont be able to do a good job if thats the case sooo.... the best i can do is 2nd wkend in august.
Ok, let me check with the papos crew. Won't be able to do a good job makin sandwiches? I bet yr a sammich-master. ;);)

Oh but ill need to prep cook, shop for organic meats, harvest extras from gardens and farms, clean the yard and then chris and i can promote for his play that will happen in 3 weeks. Plus maybe it'll be cooler then
Let me know and then ill lock eveyone else in.
Ok great. Id do it earlier but i just realized i have an event every weekend and the my sisters getting married :-)
Yah, August is pretty bonkers for me, but I'm sure it will happen in the future.
Let me lnow what weekends u can do. Sunday july 21st is ok. Id rather do it sooner than later ya know.
